metadata.title: Wednesday, 24th July, 2019
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE TWELFTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to electrify the following schools in Moomba Parliamentary Constituency, under the Rural Electrification Programme:
(i) Nkaba Primary; (ii) Bbwantu Primary; (iii) Nadongo Primary; (iv) Moomba Primary; and
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Housing and Infrastructure Development
parts: (a) when the tarring of township roads under the C400 Project will commence in Chifubu Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) whether there are any plans to expand Kwacha road, from Ndola Central Hospital roundabout to Chifubu Local Court, to four lanes;
(c) who the contractor for the project is;
(d) what the cost of the project is;
(e) what the total number of kilometres to be tarred is; and
(f) how many jobs for the local people will be created under the Project in the Constituency.
